description:
Eimi’s never been to the beach, and when she’s assigned a summer class her dreams of a vacation are dashed. She schemes to keep it a secret so Kazuki will take her anyway—but she’s got to avoid everyone else, too! Something smell fishy to you?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fumiuu~n, Watashi o Umi ni Tsuretette!
Fumyuun! Take Me to the Beach!
ふみゅ~ん, 私を海に連れてって!
